notesStmt.note: In verse: first line reads, "POets of old, about to write, did use".
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
In two settings. Copy at 2124.1:93a has title: THE/The Good Old Cause/REVIVED; copies at 1701:18 and 2124.1:93b have title: THE/Good Old Cause/REVIVED.
Imperfect: copy at 2124.1:93a torn and stained, with loss of text.
Reproductions of the originals in Harvard University Library (reel 1701) and British Library (reel 2124).
